content: designed during the early days of the covid-19 quarantine first as a fun little project in case you need one and second to set in a window as a way to spread a little cheer you likely have all the materials you need to make these--i designed it specifically knowing you probably can t get out to your favorite yarn or craft shop for a little while and it s such a quick and easy project you ll be able to whip one up anytime someone might need a little cheering up--even if that someone is you this pattern is my gift to you and it will always be free i ask only that you share your project with others in a way to spread a little cheer--even if it s as a gift of self-love
